CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("https://www.google.com/maps/dir/" & IF((b3o__Coordinates__Latitude__s > -1 && b3o__Coordinates__Latitude__s < 0), ("-0" & TRIM(right(TEXT(b3o__Coordinates__Latitude__s) , (LEN( TEXT(b3o__Coordinates__Latitude__s)) - 1)))), IF((b3o__Coordinates__Latitude__s < 1 && b3o__Coordinates__Latitude__s > 0), ("0" & TEXT(b3o__Coordinates__Latitude__s)), TEXT(b3o__Coordinates__Latitude__s))) & "," & IF((b3o__Coordinates__Longitude__s > -1 && b3o__Coordinates__Longitude__s < 0), ("-0" & TRIM(right(TEXT(b3o__Coordinates__Longitude__s) , (LEN( TEXT(b3o__Coordinates__Longitude__s)) - 1)))), IF((b3o__Coordinates__Longitude__s < 1 && b3o__Coordinates__Longitude__s > 0), ("0" & TEXT(b3o__Coordinates__Longitude__s)), TEXT(b3o__Coordinates__Longitude__s))), "View", "_blank")
CustomField.label: Site Location Link
